Service Details: - Acts as an advocate, liaison and representative at federal and provincial levels of government, the City of West Kelowna, Westbank First Nation, BC Chamber of Commerce (District #6), Canadian Chamber of Commerce, and Kelowna International Airport Advisory Committee tables- Provides networking and educational opportunities such as Business After Hours monthly events, business marketing workshops, key business awards, referrals to your business, free business card racking at the Board of Trade office, listing on the website along with your logo and description of your business- A link on the website to your web site is optional for $25/year plus GST- 1 Free Member to Member eBlast per year
